app.name: MyImpact
app.tagline: Generate your performance review summary in seconds

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyHint: Required for AI-generated performance summaries. Your key is stored locally and never sent to our servers.

reports.title: Saved Reports
reports.description: View and load your previously saved performance reports
reports.emptyHint: Generate a report and save it to see it here

search.title: Search Parameters
search.description: Configure the date range and organization to fetch your merged PRs

overview.noPrsFound: No pull requests found for the given criteria.

ai.title: AI-Generated Performance Summary
ai.description: Let AI analyze your contributions and generate a performance review summary
ai.apiKeyRequiredHint: Click the menu icon and go to Settings to configure your API key.
ai.clickGenerate: Click "Generate Summary" to create your performance review
ai.generateFirst: Generate a report first to use AI summary

save.title: Save Report
save.description: Give your report a name to save it for later

compare.title: Period Comparison
compare.description: Compare your contributions across different time periods to track your growth

initial.ready: Ready to generate your impact report
initial.configure: Configure the parameters above and click "Generate Report"
